name: Shinkansen Scratch (Bar Only)
description: Contains only the navigation bar from my Scratch 2.0 according to shinkansen. See more info about the userstyle changes here. Ask me on scratch or github if you'd like unminified development CSS.
css: @-moz-document domain("scratch.mit.edu"){#topnav form.search{position:absolute;display:inline-block;bottom:3px}#topnav form.search input{box-shadow:none;border-radius:0;width:170px;-webkit-transition:250ms all;-moz-transition:250ms all;-o-transition:250ms all}#topnav{background-color:#02b0ff;box-shadow:0 0 20px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}#topnav ul.site-nav li.last{width:0}#topnav ul.site-nav li.last a{font-size:0;cursor:default}#topnav ul.site-nav li.last:after{content:'';display:block;position:fixed;opacity:1;top:0;width:calc(50% - 100px);right:0;border-bottom:35px solid #fff;border-left:35px solid transparent;cursor:default}#topnav ul.account-nav>li>span,#topnav ul.site-nav li:first-child a{color:#02b0ff}.dropdown span.dropdown-toggle span.caret{border-top:4px solid #02b0ff;opacity:1}#topnav ul.account-nav.logged-in>li,#topnav ul.account-nav>li,#topnav ul.site-nav li,#topnav ul.site-nav li.last{z-index:10;border-left:none;border-right:none}#topnav ul.site-nav li:hover{background-color:#008ece}#topnav ul.site-nav li:nth-child(2) a{font-size:0}#topnav ul.site-nav li:nth-child(2) a:before{content:'Find Projects';font-size:15px}#topnav ul.site-nav li:nth-child(3){position:fixed;right:calc(50% - 65px);height:35px}#topnav ul.site-nav li:first-child{position:fixed;right:calc(50% - 175px);height:35px}#topnav ul.account-nav .my-stuff .mystuff-icon{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/rqrJnyw.png) center center no-repeat}#topnav ul.account-nav .messages .messages-icon{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/AbjUMwL.png) center center no-repeat}#topnav ul.account-nav .logged-in-user .user-icon{border:none;border-radius:2px;position:relative;bottom:1px}#topnav ul.account-nav .logged-in-user.dropdown.open,#topnav ul.account-nav>li.sign-in.open{background-color:#ddd!important}#topnav ul.account-nav .logged-in-user .dropdown-menu{background-color:#fff}#topnav ul.account-nav li:hover,#topnav ul.account-nav.logged-in li:hover,#topnav ul.account-nav>li.join-scratch:hover,#topnav ul.account-nav>li.sign-in:hover,#topnav ul.site-nav li:first-child:hover{background-color:#e5e5e5}#topnav ul.account-nav ul.user-nav li.logout.divider{border-top-color:#eee}#topnav ul.account-nav ul.user-nav li a{color:#02b0ff}#topnav ul.account-nav .sign-in .popover{background-color:#ccc;border-color:#dadada}#topnav ul.account-nav .sign-in .popover .arrow{border-bottom-color:#dadada}#topnav ul.account-nav .sign-in .popover .arrow:after{border-bottom-color:#ccc}#topnav ul.account-nav .sign-in form .forgot-password a,#topnav ul.account-nav .sign-in form label{color:#008ece}}
